body:
### Bugfixes
* `small-user-avatars` - Fix own avatar size by @OnkarRuikar in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8314
* `netiquette` - Switch write/preview tabs cause multiple banner by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8326
* `clear-pr-merge-commit-message` - Support new merge box view by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8327
* `open-all-notifications` - Fix layout of selected button by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8330
* `clean-repo-filelist-actions` - Restore feature by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8334
* Ensure disabled CSS features stay disabled after navigation by @ichard26 in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8329

### Improvements

* `emphasize-draft-pr-label` - Support notifications by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8338

### Changes

* `embed-gist-via-iframe` - Drop feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8303

## New Contributors
* @OnkarRuikar made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8314
* @swrobel made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8325
* @vio made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8336
* @ichard26 made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8329

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/25.2.26...25.3.19

### Bugfixes
* `tags-on-commits-list` - Improve support for multiple tags  by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8290
* Options page: Don't disable all features when pressing `enter` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8292
* `conventional-commits` - Fix grouping on commits with parens by @maxbrunet in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8297
* `conflict-marker` - Add support for new issue view by @Harrish92 in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8282
* `netiquette` - Switch write/preview tabs cause multiple banner by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8298
* `update-pr-from-base-branch` - Don't duplicate native button by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8293
### Improvements
* `small-user-avatars` - Don't quote avatar into comment field by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8300

## New Contributors
* @maxbrunet made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8297
* @Harrish92 made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8282

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/25.2.17...25.2.26

### Bugfixes
* `clean-rich-text-editor` - Restore feature on the first comment by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8276
* `embed-gist-inline` - Restore feature on the first comment by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8274
* Restore 3 features on the first comment of issues by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8277
* `repo-wide-file-finder` - Fix conflict with native shortcut by @injust in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8279
* `action-used-by-link` - Restore feature by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8285
* `clear-pr-merge-commit-message` - Restore feature by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8283
### Improvements
* `pr-approvals-count` - Highlight "Review Required" in yellow by @SierraKomodo in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8265

## New Contributors
* @SierraKomodo made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8265
* @cclauss made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8284
* @injust made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8279

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/25.1.24...25.2.17

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at 25.1.24 -->

### Bugfixes
* `update-pr-from-base-branch` - Support new merge box by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8193
* `selection-in-new-tab` - Support new issue view by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8231
* `quick-mention` - Support new issue view by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8225
* `easy-toggle-files` - Support new commit view by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8189
* Restore 4 features on commit lists by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8238
* `conversation-authors` - Fix spacing by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8232


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/25.1.15...25.1.24

### Bugfixes
* `esc-to-deselect-line` - Restore feature by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8190
* `conversation-activity-filter` - Fix position and color by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8188
* `show-names` - Add support for RTL names by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8194
* `show-associated-branch-prs-on-fork` - Restore feature (again) by @Machine-Maker in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8175
### Improvements
* `quick-review` - More native look by @sersorrel in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8187
* `sticky-sidebar` - Support discussions by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8197
* `linkify-user-location` - Support organization profile by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8192
* GitHub bug fix: remove bad spacing in notifications header by @shaedrich in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8208

## New Contributors
* @Michael21107 made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8181
* @shaedrich made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8208

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.12.20...25.1.15

### Improvements * Add "Reload without Refined GitHub" action by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8170 * `hide-low-quality-comments` - Hide more comments by @FloEdelmann in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8145 * `linkify-code` - Support inline links by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8151 ### Bugfixes * `show-names` - Replace name correctly by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8156 * `convert-pr-to-draft-improvements` - Fix wrap by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8169 ### Support for the new [beta views](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/8123) * `clear-pr-merge-commit-message` by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8163 * `pr-branch-auto-delete` by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8165 * `closing-remarks` by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8164 * `action-pr-link` by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8162 * `rgh-netiquette` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8141 * `show-names` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8159 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.12.10...24.12.20 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]
- Firefox-only version to fix hotfix-related bugs: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/8142 https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/8144

### Bugfixes * `pull-request-hotkeys` - Restore feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8132 * `safer-destructive-actions` - Restore feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8134 * `comments-time-machine-links` - Support new view by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8121 * `comments-time-machine-links` - Add support for all "Code" links by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8133 * Improve hotfix loading reliability by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8128 * Open Welcome page links in new tab in Safari by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8135 ### Improvements * `suggest-commit-title-limit` - Disable on merged PRs by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8119 * `previous-version` - Show in blame page by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8122 * `unread-anywhere` - Apply `pr-notification-link` to links by @bo0tzz in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8138 * `restore-file` - Add confirm modal by @uncenter in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8139 * Faster disableable CSS features by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8140 ### Options page * Add button to refresh hotfixes by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8127 * Change visualization of fine-grained tokens by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8137 ## New Contributors * @uncenter made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8139 * @bo0tzz made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8138 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.12.2...24.12.9 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

### Bugfixes * Fix missing colors on GitHub Enterprise by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8111 * Options: expand screenshot inline instead of new tab by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8117 * `one-key-formatting` - Enable on commit title fields by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8113 * `conventional-commits` - Support links following the type by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8114 * `clean-conversation-headers` - Restore "fixed by" link by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8102 * `clear-pr-merge-commit-message` - Clear at every opening by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8112 ### Support for the new [beta views](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/7808) * `show-names` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8093 * `hide-diff-signs` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8094 * `scrollable-areas` - Remove from new commit conversation view by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8100 ### Improvements * `pr-branch-auto-delete` - Skip branches with active PRs by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7786 * Fix GitHub bug: broken layout with long release assets names by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8116 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.11.21...24.12.2 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

### Bugfixes * `clean-conversation-sidebar` - Don't break the label picker by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8067 * `hide-low-quality-comments` - Fix feature on linked comments by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8078 * `pr-branch-auto-delete` - Restore feature by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8056 * `conversation-authors` - Avoid border clip on Windows by @darkred in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8051 * `quick-label-removal` - Show only if you can remove labels by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8068 * `reactions-avatars` - Fix feature in locked conversation by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8083 * `unread-anywhere` - Change shortcut to `g u` to avoid conflicts by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8071 * `rgh-token-user` - Fix token button style by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8057 * `locked-issue` - Detect status more reliably by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7842 * Fix storage display in options by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8061 * Preserve some feature upon navigation by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8072 ### Support for the new [beta views](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/7808) * `netiquette` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8075 * `shorten-links` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8086 * `scrollable-areas` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8089 * `linkify-user-labels` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8087 * `extend-diff-expander` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8076 ### Changes * `mobile-tabs` - Further tighten spacing by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8070 * `submission-via-ctrl-enter-everywhere` - Drop feature by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8050 * `linkify-notification-repository-header` - Drop feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8063 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.11.12...24.11.21 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

### Bugfixes
* Work around Firefox bug that causes tab freezes by @joostlek in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8041
* `table-input` - Fix sidebar overlap; Further improve performance by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8042
* `clean-repo-tabs` - Fix console error by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8040
* `more-dropdown-links` - Fix duplicates on security tab by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8044
* `clean-conversation-headers` - Support new PR view by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8037
* `show-associated-branch-prs-on-fork` - Restore feature by @Machine-Maker in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8043

### Improvements
* `status-subscription` - Improve contrast by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8047
* `cross-deleted-pr-branches` - Also dim link by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8045

## New Contributors
* @joostlek made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8041

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.11.9...24.11.12

### New * `mobile-tabs` - Also compact PR tabs by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8033
mobile-tabs
### Support for the new [beta views](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/7856) * `jump-to-conversation-close-event` by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8011 * `conversation-authors` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8025 * `netiquette` by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8010 * `show-names` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8021 ### Bugfixes * `rgh-netiquette` - Fix console error on open PRs and issues by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8020 * `patch-diff-links` - Restore feature on non-beta issues by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8015 * `html-preview-link` - Restore feature by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8013 * `keyboard-navigation` - Restore navigation without pre-selection by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8023 * `default-branch-button` - Fix Firefox rounded corners bug by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8030 * `batch-mark-files-as-viewed` - Don't select excluded files by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8029 ### Meta * Label notifications as coming from Refined GitHub by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8032 * Adjust spacing/borders in options by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8028 ## New Contributors * @GauBen made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7979 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.11.5...24.11.9 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

### New * `unread-anywhere` - New feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8008
unread-anywhere demo: pressing gu
### Bugfixes * `linkify-code` - Restore feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7985 * `tags-on-commits-list` - Improve GitHub Enterprise compatibility by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8005 * `conversation-activity-filter` - Restore on issues by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8007 * `bugs-tab` - Support `issue-bug` by @koppor in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7993 ### Support for the new [beta views](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/7856) * `show-names` by @ToBinio in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7982 * `shorten-links` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7981 * `emphasize-draft-pr-label` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7974 * `clean-conversation-headers` - Support new PR view by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8001 * `small-user-avatars` - Don't duplicate native functionality by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7975 ### Meta * Warn user of mismatch between token user and logged-in user by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/8002 ## New Contributors * @koppor made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7993 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.10.28...24.11.5 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

### Bugfixes * Workaround for fatal Safari CSS bug by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7949 * `linkify-code` - Restore feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7965 * `select-notifications` - Fix selection bug by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7961 * `default-branch-button` - Fix wrapping on mobile by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7963 ### Support for the new [issue beta](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/7856) _Big thanks to @kovsu for tackling these issues!_ * `embed-gist-inline` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7958 * `prevent-link-loss` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7955 * `rgh-linkify-features` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7970 * `conversation-authors` by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7971 * `scrollable-areas` by @ToBinio in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7952 ### Changes * Fix GitHub bug: Notification buttons overlap on mobile by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7964 * `link-to-changelog-file` - Make UI more compact by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7956 ### Meta * Make selector-related runtime errors more clear by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7966 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.10.24...24.10.28 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

Fix layout on profiles by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7915 * `fit-textareas` - Avoid conflict with native feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7937 * `unreleased-commits` - Only show "Create release" if allowed by @whisperity in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7921 ### Changes * `infinite-scroll` - Drop feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7943 * `hide-newsfeed-noise` - Drop feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7941 ## New Contributors * @ToBinio made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7924 * @whisperity made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7921 * @berniedurfee-renaissance made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7946 > [!TIP] > If you're using the new [issues beta](https://github.blog/changelog/2024-10-01-evolving-github-issues-public-beta/), please adopt your favorite feature among the [broken ones](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/7856#issuecomment-2413307020) by sending a PR. 🌳 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.10.14...24.10.24 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

> [!IMPORTANT]
> GitHub is about to ship a [major refresh for Issues](https://github.blog/changelog/2024-10-01-evolving-github-issues-public-beta/). This breaks so many Refined GitHub features. 
> Consider [contributing](https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues?q=+is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+beta+in%3Atitle) or [sponsoring the project](https://github.com/sponsors/fregante) because this will require a lot of work these coming weeks. 

### Support for the new issue beta

* `netiquette` (partial) in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7889
* `tab-to-indent` in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7888
* `one-key-formatting` in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7892
* `unfinished-comments` in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7890
* `clean-rich-text-editor` in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7891

### Bugfixes

* `clean-conversation-filters` - Fix error on project-free orgs in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7902
* Restore GH Enterprise token checker in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7905
* Improve user capability detection across multiple features by @kovsu and @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7798

> [!NOTE]
> Users that never added a token will be shown a one-time welcome screen starting in this version. Until now it seems many people never even knew about the token.

### Meta

* Improve first-install flow to facilitate token input in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7854
* Improve console output in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7899 and https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7825
* Finalize MV3 switch in Firefox too in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7906



**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.10.11...24.10.14

### New * `sidebar-focus-file` - New feature by @foriequal0 in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7848 * `quick-repo-deletion` - Two-click deletion with key modifiers by @InSyncWithFoo in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7866 * `linkify-code` - Add support for `GH-num` and `forkuser@num` by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7884 * Fix GitHub bug: wrong sponsor button size in mobile view by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7868

If you're still experiencing severe performance degradation (e.g. complete hang for 2-3 seconds), please open an issue with more details. ### Bugfixes * `warning-for-disallow-edits` - Restore feature by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7583 * `draft-pr-notice` - Avoid showing in wrong places by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7568 * `netiquette` - Avoid showing in wrong places by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7569 * `quick-mention` - Fix position by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7589 * `clean-repo-sidebar` - Show packages if not empty by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7552 * `unfinished-comments` - Fix repetition by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7546 ### Changes * `always-show-branch-delete-buttons` - Drop feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7587 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.7.10...24.7.23 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

### Performance * Detect page change earlier, remove listeners by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7513 This should further improve performance on page change as described in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/issues/7331, especially on Firefox. If you're still experiencing severe performance degradation (e.g. complete hang for 2-3 seconds), please open an issue with more details. ### Bugfixes * `action-pr-link` - Restore feature on Actions tab by @gxr404 in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7535 * `small-user-avatars` - Restore feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7538 * `previous-version` - Various fixes by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7539 ### Improvements * `fit-textareas` - Make it more visible by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7440 * `comment-on-draft-pr-indicator` - Move above field by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7514 ## New Contributors * @gxr404 made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7519 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.7.1...24.7.10 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

### Improvements * `netiquette` - Support review comments by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7516 * `shorten-links` - Improve shortener by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7490 * `closing-remarks` - Add link to more details by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7498 * `list-prs-for-file` - Style improvements by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7507 * Larger text size in the options by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7494 * Add "Options…" context menu to Firefox and Safari by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7489 * `suggest-commit-title-limit` - Enable on other PR tabs by @karlhorky in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7484 ### Bugfixes * `tags-on-commits-list` - Restore feature by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7495 * `list-prs-for-file` - Prevent symbols panel overlapping by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7508 * `clean-footer` - Restore feature by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7512 * `visit-tag` - Work around GitHub tag picker icon bug by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7492 * `netiquette` - Fix spacing on small screen by @kidonng in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7517 ### Changes * `show-whitespace` - Restore feature on Firefox and Safari by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7487 ## New Contributors * @QuartzWarrior made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7497 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.6.25...24.7.1 [link-chrome]: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/refined-github/hlepfoohegkhhmjieoechaddaejaokhf 'Version published on Chrome Web Store' [link-firefox]: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/refined-github-/ 'Version published on Mozilla Add-ons' [link-safari]: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1519867270 'Version published on the Mac App Store' **Latest release available in store** (live badges): [][link-chrome] [][link-firefox] [][link-safari]

name: 24.6.25 (Firefox only)
body: This release avoids a Firefox bug that suggests Refined GitHub needs more permissions, with a badge: On update, you might be prompted to accept new permissions, but that's not correct, the permissions haven't been changed. ### Bugfixes * Improve support for mobile Firefox by @INSANEMODE in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7480 * Avoid "Permission needed" bug on Firefox for now by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7485 ## New Contributors * @INSANEMODE made their first contribution in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7480 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/compare/24.6.21...24.6.25

### Improvements * `comment-excess` - New feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7433 * `linkify-line-numbers` - New feature by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7426 * `open-all-notifications` - Add keyboard shortcut: P by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7434 * `suggest-commit-title-limit` - Enable on PR title by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7428 * `conversation-activity-filter` - Add label to Events by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7427 * `sort-conversations-by-update-time` - Various improvements by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7422 * `list-prs-for-file` - Improve performance by @kovsu in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7451 ### Meta * Migrate to Manifest Version 3 by @fregante in https://github.com/refined-github/refined-github/pull/7473
